text: Madelaine Grobbelaar Petsch (born August 18, 1994) is an American actress. She is known for playing Cheryl Blossom in The CW series Riverdale. Her movie credits include F the Prom (2017) and Polaroid (2019). She also has a YouTube channel, with over five million subscribers. Petsch was born in Port Orchard, Washington. Her parents are from South Africa. She is a vegan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:South African actors Category:American YouTubers
title: Madelaine Petsch
